Package io.github.ololx.moonshine.stopwatch

Interface Stopwatch

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleStopwatch
public interface Stopwatch
An object that provides a set of methods and properties that can be used to accurately measure elapsed time. The Stopwatch interface provides four methods:
  • start - start the stopwatch, start at first or after stop usage (from idle state).
  • stop - stop the stopwatch and calculate elapsed time, can be used like pause state
  • reset - reset the stopwatch and clear elapsed time to 0
  • elapsed - return the elapsed time before current moment.
project moonshine created 06.01.2023 19:59
Author:
Alexander A. Kropotin
